oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Office of the Secretary of the Department of State correspondence with Penelope Johnson Allen, 1935 January 10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: United States. Department of State. Office of the Secretary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from the Office of the Secretary of the Department of State to Penelope J. Allen announcing that her copy of the resolution proposing a commemorative stamp was received and going to be sent forward to the department for comment.
